summary: This function converts a value to a string.
formals: is the value to convert to a string.
returns: Return the string representation of the value.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val x = F::str(null);%0A    val y = F::str(17);%0A    val z = F::str(%22Venus%22);%0A%0A    F::println(x);%0A    F::println(y);%0A    F::println(z);%0A}
